com.coalesce.ttb.blocks

Class FontLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coalesce.plugin.CoModule
      • com.coalesce.ttb.blocks.FontLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class FontLoader
extends com.coalesce.plugin.CoModule
    FontLoader loads in fonts stored in the /fonts folder and stores them to be accessed quickly later
